name: Bank of Hawaii Corporation
description: Bank of Hawaii Corporation is a regional bank headquartered in Honolulu, Hawaii. Founded in 1897, it has a rich history of serving the financial needs of the islands' residents and businesses. The bank offers a wide range of financial services, including personal banking, commercial banking, investment management, and wealth management solutions. With a strong commitment to community involvement, Bank of Hawaii plays a significant role in supporting local initiatives and economic development. The bank is known for its customer-centric approach, providing tailored financial solutions to meet the diverse needs of its clients. Bank of Hawaii operates more than 60 branches and numerous ATMs across Hawaii and the Pacific Islands, making it a convenient banking option for residents. In addition to traditional banking products, the bank also offers online and mobile banking services, enabling customers to manage their finances with ease. Recognized for its financial stability and excellent customer service, Bank of Hawaii continues to build trust and long-term relationships with its customers, contributing to the economic growth of the communities it serves.

key_executives.name: Kathy M. S. M. K. M. Lee

seo.meta_title: Bank of Hawaii Corporation | Regional Banking Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Bank of Hawaii Corporation, your trusted regional bank offering personal, commercial, and wealth management services. Committed to community and customer satisfaction.

faq.question: What services does Bank of Hawaii offer?
faq.answer: Bank of Hawaii offers personal banking, commercial banking, investment management, and wealth management services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Bank of Hawaii?
faq.answer: Peter S. Ho is the Chairman, President, and CEO of Bank of Hawaii Corporation.

faq.question: Where is Bank of Hawaii headquartered?
faq.answer: Bank of Hawaii is headquartered in Honolulu, Hawaii, USA.

faq.question: When was Bank of Hawaii founded?
faq.answer: Bank of Hawaii was founded in 1897.
